00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 
00032 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00033   * @{
00034   */
00035 
00036 /** @addtogroup BFTM_Examples BFTM
00037   * @{
00038   */
00039 
00040 /** @addtogroup RepetitiveToggle
00041   * @{
00042   */
00043 
00044 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00045 #if (LIBCFG_BFTM_16BIT_COUNTER)
00046 #define BFTM_COMPARE_VALUE   (0xFFFF) // Maximum value of 16-bit counter
00047 #else
00048 #define BFTM_COMPARE_VALUE   (SystemCoreClock / 2) // 0.5 second
00049 #endif
00050 
00051 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 void BFTM_Configuration(void);
00053 
00054 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00055 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00056   * @brief  Main program.
00057   * @retval None
00058   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00059 int main(void)
00060 {
00061   HT32F_DVB_LEDInit(HT_LED1);
00062 
00063   BFTM_Configuration();
00064 
00065   while (1)
00066   {
00067   }
00068 }
00069 
00070 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00071   * @brief  BFTM Configuration.
00072   * @retval None
00073   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00074 void BFTM_Configuration(void)
00075 {
00076   #if 0 // Use following function to configure the IP clock speed.
00077   CKCU_SetPeripPrescaler(CKCU_PCLK_BFTM0, CKCU_APBCLKPRE_DIV2);
00078   #endif
00079 
00080   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00081     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00082     CKCUClock.Bit.BFTM0 = 1;
00083     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00084   }
00085 
00086   /* BFTM as Repetitive mode to trigger the match interrupt                                                 */
00087   BFTM_SetCompare(HT_BFTM0, BFTM_COMPARE_VALUE);
00088   BFTM_SetCounter(HT_BFTM0, 0);
00089   BFTM_IntConfig(HT_BFTM0, ENABLE);
00090   BFTM_EnaCmd(HT_BFTM0, ENABLE);
00091 
00092   NVIC_EnableIRQ(BFTM0_IRQn);
00093 }
00094 
00095 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00096 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00097   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00098   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00099   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00100   * @retval None
00101   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00102 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00103 {
00104   /*
00105      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00106      Debug message can be added here.
00107      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00108   */
00109 
00110   while (1)
00111   {
00112   }
00113 }
00114 #endif
